CSL_RatExceptionInfo Struct Reference
Region-based Address Translation (RAT) » RAT Data Structures

This structure contains exception status information returned by the CSL_ratGetExceptionInfo function. More...

Detailed Description

This structure contains exception status information returned by the CSL_ratGetExceptionInfo function.

uint32_t CSL_RatExceptionInfo::type
